column4: why can't apt find this version?  sudo apt-get install pidgin=1:2.10.0-0ubuntu2~P20120323
why can't apt find this version?  sudo apt-get install pidgin=1:2.10.0-0ubuntu2~P20120323, I've added ppa:renatosilva/ppa and apt-get updated and
third party ppa are not trusted ppa's by ubuntu
thanks... but I can't understand how it answers the question, sorry. Besides, I'm the author of the patch, and I trust myself
how posted the ppa u?  You sure u have the right kernel for the version of pidgin??
